value.title: The Power BI Smart Narrative visual is INSANE AMAZING!
value.excerpt: The smart narrative visual can help tell the story in your Power BI report. Justyna Lucznik joins us to explore the visual and to illustrate how you can generate text about your data.  Make sure you have the September 2020 version of Power BI Desktop, or later.  Documentation: https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/visuals/power-bi-visualization-smart-narrative
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/7d2qMoTPCIM" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Unboxing Tabular Editor 3 | Reaction Video
value.excerpt: It's here! Patrick does a reaction video when using Tabular Editor 3 for the first time with Power BI. To say he's excited is an understatement. Watch him take the wrapping off of Tabular Editor.  Tabular Editor: https://tabulareditor.com/  📢 Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership   *******************

value.title: What tool do you use to optimize your Power BI dataset?
value.excerpt: Need some help optimizing your Power BI Dataset but don't want to hand over your Power BI Desktop file? value.title: When is a date not a date in Power BI?
value.excerpt: When is a date not a date? We all use them in our data. Patrick looks at how data types can be a tricky thing in Power BI. value.title: Advanced Power BI Bookmark Options (Data/Display/Current Page)
value.excerpt: If you use Power BI Bookmarks you may not have used the advanced bookmarking options for  ➔ Bookmark Data ➔ Bookmark Display  ➔ Bookmark Current Page I talk about these options and show you were these can really help you out when using Power BI Bookmarks in advanced scenarios.  ================================
